00007 #ifndef PIFILTER_H
00008 #define PIFILTER_H
00009 
00010 #include "Filter.h"
00011 
00012 namespace tpk {
00013 
00015 
00021    class PiFilter : public Filter {
00022       protected:
00023          double Pgain;
00024          double Igain;
00025          double Window2;
00026          double Saturate;
00027          double Integrator;
00028       public:
00029          PiFilter(
00030             const double pgain,     
00031             const double igain,     
00032             const double window,    
00033             const double saturate   
00034          ) : Pgain(pgain),
00035              Igain(igain),
00036              Window2(window * window),
00037              Saturate(saturate),
00038              Integrator(0.0) {};
00039          PiFilter(
00040             const PiFilter& src
00041          ) : Filter(src) {
00042             src.Mutex.lock();
00043             Pgain = src.Pgain;
00044             Igain = src.Igain;
00045             Window2 = src.Window2;
00046             Saturate = src.Saturate;
00047             Integrator = src.Integrator;
00048             src.Mutex.unlock();
00049          }
00050 
00052          PiFilter(
00053             const double pgain      
00054          ) : Pgain(pgain),
00055              Igain(0.0),
00056              Window2(0.0),
00057              Saturate(0.0),
00058              Integrator(0.0) {};
00059 
00061          virtual PiFilter* clone() const {
00062             return new PiFilter(*this);
00063          };
00064 
00066          virtual double operator<<(
00067             double input
00068          );
00069 
00071          virtual void reset( 
00072             double value = 0.0   
00073          ) {
00074             Mutex.lock();
00075             Value = value;
00076             Integrator = 0.0;
00077             Mutex.unlock();
00078          };
00079 
00081          virtual void tune(
00082             const double pgain,     
00083             const double igain,     
00084             const double window,    
00085             const double saturate   
00086          ) {
00087             Mutex.lock();
00088             Pgain = pgain;
00089             Igain = igain;
00090             Window2 = window * window;
00091             Saturate = saturate;
00092             Mutex.unlock();
00093          };
00094 
00095        private:
00097          PiFilter(); 
00098    };
00099 }
00100 #endif
